description: React component for the Home page of a Samsung TV web app. It includes sections for TV details, status display, remote connection controls, banners, media rails, and subscription options.

methods.name: img
methods.description: Helper function to generate image asset paths based on the filename.

methods.name: pill
methods.description: Creates a styled span element representing a status pill (connected, connecting, error, disconnected).

methods.name: openRemoteOverlay
methods.description: Sets state to show the remote control overlay.

methods.name: closeRemoteOverlay
methods.description: Sets state to hide the remote control overlay.
